title: Ling Tian Du Zun
synopsis:
Ling Tian, ​​a sword saint of his generation, went against the will of heaven to seize the stele in order to save his beloved, but was plotted against by the way of heaven. When he fell, he perished together with the way of heaven, but was unexpectedly reborn, returning to the moment of his death three hundred years ago when his dantian was completely destroyed and his sword bone was taken away. His beauty is still there, his old enemy is still there, and he has been on the long road to becoming a saint, so why not start over? In this life, he vows to rewrite his destiny and make up for his regrets! 

(Source: Iqiyi, Google translated)
